thread.title: Shahid Kapoor shares pre-birthday bash photo with Mira Rajput – See Pic | Zee News
thread.title_full: Shahid Kapoor shares pre-birthday bash photo with Mira Rajput – See Pic | Zee News

title: Shahid Kapoor shares pre-birthday bash photo with Mira Rajput – See Pic | Zee News
text:
Shahid Kapoor shares pre-birthday bash photo with Mira Rajput – See Pic By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 12:45 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
Mumbai: One of Bollywood’s most talented actors – Shahid Kapoor – is probably in the best phase of his career. Even in the personal front, Shahid is ecstatic for a number of reasons. 
The ‘Kaminey’ star, recently hosted a pre-birthday bash that was attended by a number of big names in the film industry. He took to Twitter Sunday night to post a photograph from the party. 
The hunk of an actor struck a pose with his ladylove Mira and captioned the photograph “bestbirthdayever”. 
Check out the image below: A post shared by Shahid Kapoor (@shahidkapoor) on Feb 19, 2017 at 11:43am PST 
Well, this is Shahid’s first birthday after the arrival of his daughter Misha, who was born August 26 last year. And hence, this birthday is very special because he has not just grown a year-older but also become a father now. 
Shahid, who is looking forward to the release of his upcoming film – Rangoon – married Mira Rajput on July 7, 2015 in a private ceremony attended by close friends and family. He later threw a bash for his friends in the Tinsel Town. 
Shahid Kapoor will turn 36 on February 25. Here’s wishing him a very Happy Birthday in advance. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 09:51 More from zeenews
